example.description: This example lists all patch baselines, with a maximum result list of 1.

example.code:
PS C:\> (Get-SSMEffectivePatchesForPatchBaseline -BaselineId "pb-0a2f1059b670ebd31" -MaxResult 1).PatchStatus
ApprovalDate DeploymentStatus ------------ ---------------- 12/21/2010 6:00:00 PM APPROVED
example.description: This example displays the patch status for all patch baselines, with a maximum result list of 1.
